Mysterious Lackey :

God be with you the glory of the lord , the participants of the battle ! I'll tell you briefly about the rules and rewards . All the characters are facing the Arena of Chaos, become subjects . In most other items changes and restrictions.

Attention !
  1. After the competition there is a moving to the entrance.
  2. who left the arena before the end of the event will be moved to the Rune . In case of fall
  3. server during a match occurs moving all in Rune . In the event of a fall during a server application will be no contest .
  4. If during one period will be canceled and more than 30 applications for the competition (for 4 min./19 min./34 min./49 min. before moving into the arena or after moving ) , Chaos Arena closes. If the application has not been canceled , but the conditions are in place to move the match were not met , the application shall be counted cancellation .

Conducting competitions
  1. Full-time competition - 5 min.
  2. Battle starts in 60 seconds. after moving into the arena. Until that moment, you can not move around and see the other participants .
  3. During competitions Mysterious Guard does not appear.
  4. On the 1st and 3rd minute offers refuge .

Winner
  1. victory recorded when the battlefield is one character .
  2. Otherwise winning player who kills the most .
  3. Otherwise draw. If
  4. competition involved only one character , it automatically becomes a winner , if not come Mysterious Guard .

awarding Time
  1. After the winner he gets arbitrarily from 1 to 5 mysterious box , giving the right to remuneration .
  2. Loser can get two mysterious footprints as a promotional prize.
